articles.author: Aislinn Murphy
articles.title: City in Florida considered America's best spot to live: where do other cities stack up? - Fox Business
articles.description: The Sunshine State is home to the city that just nabbed the title of the best spot to live in the U.S..: Naples, Florida, according to U.S. News & World Report.
articles.content:
The Sunshine State is home to the city that just nabbed the title of the best spot to live in the U.S.
That development comes as U.S. News & World Report on Tuesday identified Naples, which sits… [+3421 chars]
